history.content:
I took Data 100 without Data 8, and while you would be fine with the programming aspects of the class, it may be more difficult to understand the statistics-heavy parts of the class. I'd look through the Data 8 textbook to brush up on statistical concepts (e.g. probability, bootstrapping, etc) that you should know for Data 100.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Before I took Data 100, I had taken Stat 133, CS 61A, Math 54, and AP stats. Data 100 is doable for me without Data 8.

I took Data 100 without Data 8, and while you would be fine with the programming aspects of the class, it may be more difficult to understand the statistics-heavy parts of the class. I'd look through the Data 8 textbook to brush up on statistical concepts (e.g. probability, bootstrapping, etc) that you should know for Data 100.

I'd look through the Data 8 textbook to brush up on statistical concepts (e.g. probability, bootstrapping, etc) that you should know for Data 100/

Hello everyone, I have a question. Is taking Data 100 without Data 8 during summer doable. I have not taken Data 8 and I finished CS 61A and currently at CS 61B. If it is doable what advice would you want to give?
history.subject: Taking Data 100 without Data 8
